list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the vapor into which water is converted when heated, forming a white mist of minute water droplets in the air.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a mug of coffee was steaming at her elbow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một cốc cà phê đang hấp ở khuỷu tay của cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cook (food) by heating it in steam from boiling water.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: steam the vegetables until just tender
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: hấp rau cho đến khi chỉ đấu thầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a ship or train) travel somewhere under steam power.
be or become extremely agitated or angry.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you got all steamed up over nothing!
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn đã có tất cả hấp lên không có gì!
